title: Marksmen and Deathfire Touch?
body:
Which marksmen, if any, would you choose to take Deathfire Touch as your keystone over Fervor of Battle, Thunderlords, and Warlords Bloodlust?

I'm not just asking which marksmen *can* use it. I'm asking which marksmen have the potential to use this mastery to deal more damage than they would with the other damage-focused masteries.

replies.body: I could only really see it on Corki, but that's quite iffy.
Maybe Lucian. But both of them like Thunderlord's a lot for the early lane dominance, and Corki in particular benefits heavily from Precision's dual penetration even after the nerf.
